summary: This mod adds 20 more orcs to the base Skyrim continent.  Each of these orcs are unique and are spread throughout the province. The majority are marriage candidates.  No DLC required.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds 20 more orcs to the base Skyrim continent.  Each of these orcs are unique and are spread throughout the province.  Below are a list of each of them and where you might find them:

Dark Brotherhood

Ugadurash gra-Bugabul - She is a member of the Dawnstar Sanctuary (can marry)

Yambdumph gro-Murdbuk - He is a member of the Dawnstar Sanctuary (can marry)

Dushnikh Yal

Braon - He is a warrior of the stronghold (can marry)

Oraga - She is a brawler of the stronghold (can marry)

Largashbur

Grokh - He is a hunter of the stronghold (can marry)

Shezush - She is a spellsword of the stronghold (can marry)

Markarth

Maknnag gro-Glurgul - He is a city guard

Mor Khazgur

Dumnag - He is a spellsword warrior of the stronghold (can marry)

Nargurash - She is a warrior of the stronghold (can marry)

Morthal

Mazgmesh gra-Lazmph - She is a city guard

Narzulbur

Atuza - She is a hunter of the stronghold (can marry)

Murkl - He is an alchemist and a destruction mage at the stronghold (can marry)

Solitude

Lugrel gro-Duroa - He is a member of the Bards College (can marry)

Yatuza gra-Shazrbag - She is a member of the Bards College (can marry)

Riften

Oraggat gra-Bagrg - She is a member of the Thieves Guild (can marry)

Urullak gro-Kashrkul - He is a member of the Thieves Guild (can marry)

Whiterun

Lambub gra-Yarzma - She is a member of the Companions (can marry)

Shelbub gro-Burgarz - He is a member of the Companions (can marry)

Winterhold

Garoharz gro-Bumplob - He is a member of the College of Winterhold (can marry)

Globish gra-Magrlor - She is a member of the College of Winterhold (can marry)

Changelog:
V1:
-The initial release.

Known Bugs:
None at this time

Note:
Some voices will not sound Orcish due to basic Bethesda limitations.

Credits:
Orc Name Generator - http://fantasynamegenerators.com/orc_es_names.php


Follow me on Facebook for updates: [url=https://www.facebook.com/ArronDominionProductions/]Arron Dominion Productions[/url]
author: Arron Dominion
